con:config.script:
UUID uuid = UUID.randomUUID() def referralId = "Referral" + uuid
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("referralId",referralId)
log.info (referralId)

con:config.script:
UUID uuid = UUID.randomUUID() def referralId = "Referral" + uuid
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("referralId",referralId)
log.info (referralId)
